S.FORM: alang Mkzihing ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Nahuy go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 51 buwan, 147 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 76 kyan ku 111 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 24 kyan ku 36 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 71 , Paywan 2 , Bunun 1 , Truku 1 , binah lihuyan s'uli 1 . maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Mkzihing hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Mkzihing hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Mkzihing hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Mkzihing hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Mkzihing hya' ga Mknahuy. tay 'llaw na Mkzihing hya' ga Piling. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
